org.biopax.validator.api

Class ValidatorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biopax.validator.api.ValidatorUtils

  • @Service
public class ValidatorUtils
extends Object
    Validator Utility Class (not BioPAX specific).

    This is injected into other beans, keeps several global settings and objects, e.g., marshaller, and also provides static service methods to register, merge, do OXM, and resolve validation errors to human-readable verbose messages.

    Author:
    rodche

      • createError

        public org.biopax.validator.api.beans.ErrorType createError(String objectName,
                                                            String errorCode,
                                                            String ruleName,
                                                            String profile,
                                                            boolean isFixed,
                                                            Object... msgArgs)
        Creates an error type with single error case.
        Parameters:
        objectName - name of the problematic model object
        errorCode - validator error code
        ruleName - validation rule name
        profile - validation profile
        isFixed - true/false - whether it's auto-fixed or not
        msgArgs - error message details
        Returns:
        error type obj.

      • createError

        public static org.biopax.validator.api.beans.ErrorType createError(org.springframework.context.MessageSource messageSource,
                                                                   Locale locale,
                                                                   String objectName,
                                                                   String errorCode,
                                                                   String ruleName,
                                                                   String profile,
                                                                   boolean isFixed,
                                                                   Object... msgArgs)
        Creates an error type with single error case. If the message source is null (e.g., in tests, when a rule is checked outside the validator framework),
        Parameters:
        messageSource - error message source
        locale - locale
        objectName - name of the problematic model object
        errorCode - validator error code
        ruleName - validation rule name
        profile - validation profile
        isFixed - true/false - whether it's auto-fixed or not
        msgArgs - error message details
        Returns:
        error type

      • getRuleBehavior

        public org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Behavior getRuleBehavior(String ruleName,
                                                               String profile)
        Gets rule's behavior (mode), to be used when registering an error case reported by the rule.
        Parameters:
        ruleName - validation rule class name, e.g., org.biopax.validator.rules.MyRule
        profile - validation profile name or null (default profile)
        Returns:
        error level/mode
        See Also:
        Behavior
